name: Black Bean and Sweet Potato Burritos
ingredients: 2 sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed small (about 3-4 cups)
1 small red onion, diced small (about 1/2 cup)
1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drain
1/4 - 1/2 cup chopped cilantro (depending on your taste)
2 teaspoons fresh lime juice (from about 1 lime)
6-8 burrito-size tortillas (whole wheat, white or other favorite variety)
instructions: RecipesRecipe IndexMain DishesDessertsHealthy Recipes30-Minute MealsBreakfastMake-Ahead Meals

2 sweet potatoes, peeled and cubed small (about 3-4 cups)

1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drain
1/4 - 1/2 cup chopped cilantro (depending on your taste)
2 teaspoons fresh lime juice (from about 1 lime)

Rebecca—July 13, 2015 @ 3:23 pmReplyJust wanted to suggest possibly using Amchoor Powder instead of Lime?I make Channa Masala all the time, and the recipe lists Amchoor powder OR lime juice.You’d have to figure out where to get it in your area… probably an indian foods store!
